DataElement.preferredName: Course Protocol Agent Pharmaceutical Dosage Form java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.:A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._A form in which a pharmaceutical product is presented in the medicinal product package as supplied by the marketing authorization holder, manufacturer, or distributor. The key defining characteristics of the pharmaceutical dosage form are the state of matter, delivery method, release characteristics, and the administration site or route for which the product is formulated._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.

Property.preferredDefinition: A form in which a pharmaceutical product is presented in the medicinal product package as supplied by the marketing authorization holder, manufacturer, or distributor. The key defining characteristics of the pharmaceutical dosage form are the state of matter, delivery method, release characteristics, and the administration site or route for which the product is formulated.

Concepts.definition: The form in which active and/or inert ingredient(s) are physically presented.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
